system.sustained: Psyker designates each creature within range as either an Ally or Enemy (can choose to designate themselves as an ally or ignore effects entirely). Allies within range must make +0 Willpower Test or sacrifice their reaction to make a Standard Attack against a target of their choice. Enemies within range must make a +0 Willpower Test or lose their reaction and suffer -5xPsy Rating to all Skill and Characteristic Tests until the start of the Psyker's next turn.
